name: R4B-ResearchStudy-R5-ResearchStudy
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B ResearchStudy into FHIR R5

element.display: Investigation to increase healthcare-related patient-independent knowledge

target.display: Investigation to increase healthcare-related patient-independent knowledge
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy`

element.display: Defined path through the study for a subject
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.condition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.condition`
R4B `ResearchStudy.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.contained`
R4B `ResearchStudy.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.description`
R4B `ResearchStudy.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `ResearchStudy.focus` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `ResearchStudy.focus` - focus has change due to type change: R4B focus CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 focus
R4B `ResearchStudy.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.id`
R4B `ResearchStudy.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.implicitRules`

element.display: Used to search for the study

target.display: Used to search for the study
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.keyword` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.keyword`
R4B `ResearchStudy.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `ResearchStudy.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.meta`

R4B `ResearchStudy.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `ResearchStudy.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `ResearchStudy.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`
R4B `ResearchStudy.objective` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective`

R4B `ResearchStudy.objective.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `ResearchStudy.objective.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.objective.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `ResearchStudy.objective.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective.name`
R4B `ResearchStudy.objective.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.objective.type`
R4B `ResearchStudy.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.partOf`

element.display: When the study began and ended

target.display: When the study began and ended
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.period`

element.display: n-a | early-phase-1 | phase-1 | phase-1-phase-2 | phase-2 | phase-2-phase-3 | phase-3 | phase-4

target.display: n-a | early-phase-1 | phase-1 | phase-1-phase-2 | phase-2 | phase-2-phase-3 | phase-3 | phase-4
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.phase` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.phase`

element.display: treatment | prevention | diagnostic | supportive-care | screening | health-services-research | basic-science | device-feasibility

target.display: treatment | prevention | diagnostic | supportive-care | screening | health-services-research | basic-science | device-feasibility
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.primaryPurposeType` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchStudy.primaryPurposeType` - primaryPurposeType changed the binding strength from Extensible to Preferred

element.display: Researcher who oversees multiple aspects of the study

target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.protocol` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.protocol`
R4B `ResearchStudy.relatedArtifact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.relatedArtifact`

element.display: Facility where study activities are conducted

target.display: Facility where study activities are conducted
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.site` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `ResearchStudy.site` - site has change due to type change: R4B `site` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `site`

element.display: Organization that initiates and is legally responsible for the study

active | administratively-completed | approved | closed-to-accrual | closed-to-accrual-and-intervention | completed | disapproved | in-review | temporarily-closed-to-accrual | temporarily-closed-to-accrual-and-intervention | withdrawn

target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-study-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.text`

target.display: Human readable name of the study
target.comment: R4B `ResearchStudy.title` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchStudy.title`
